mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.fct_name AS "fctName", r.rvt_id AS "rvtId", r.rvt_date AS "rvtDate", z.zone_id AS "zoneId", z.zone_name AS "zoneName", r.usage_start_time AS "usageStartTime", r.usage_end_time AS "usageEndTime", p.pay_state AS "payState", ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r.rvt_id DESC) AS rnum FROM reservation r JOIN zone z ON r.zone_id = z.zone_id JOIN facility f ON f.fct_id = z.fct_id JOIN payment p ON p.rvt_id = r.rvt_id WHERE r.cons_id = #{consId} ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reservation WHERE cons_id = #{consId}

SELECT f.fct_name AS "fctName", r.rvt_id AS "rvtId", r.rvt_date AS "rvtDate", z.zone_id AS "zoneId", z.zone_name AS "zoneName", f.fct_address AS "fctAddress", f.fct_detail_address AS "fctDetailAddress", r.usage_count AS "usageCount", r.usage_start_time AS "usageStartTime", r.usage_end_time AS "usageEndTime", p.pay_state AS "payState" FROM reservation r JOIN zone z ON r.zone_id = z.zone_id JOIN facility f ON f.fct_id = z.fct_id JOIN payment p ON p.rvt_id = r.rvt_id WHERE r.rvt_id = #{rvtId}

SELECT r.cons_id AS "consId", f.fct_id AS "fctId", count(*) AS "totalCount" FROM reservation r JOIN zone z ON r.zone_id = z.zone_id JOIN facility f ON z.fct_id = f.fct_id
GROUP BY r.cons_id, f.fct_id

SELECT f.fct_name AS "fctName", f.fct_id AS "fctId", img.img_path AS "repImgUrl", cat.cat_name AS "catName", f.fct_address AS "fctAddress" FROM facility f LEFT JOIN category cat ON cat.cat_id = f.cat_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT f.fct_id, COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM reservation r JOIN zone z ON r.zone_id = z.zone_id JOIN facility f ON z.fct_id = f.fct_id JOIN payment p ON p.rvt_id = r.rvt_id WHERE p.pay_state IN ('P', 'Q') AND f.fct_state = 'REG_APPROVED' GROUP BY f.fct_id ) r ON f.fct_id = r.fct_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT img.fct_id, img.img_path AS img_path FROM image img WHERE img.img_attached_to = 'F' AND img_display_order = 1 ) img ON img.fct_id = f.fct_id WHERE f.fct_state = 'REG_APPROVED' ORDER BY COALESCE(r.totalCount, 0) DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT r.usage_start_time AS "usageStartTime", r.usage_end_time AS "usageEndTime", SUM(r.usage_count) AS "totalUsageCount" FROM reservation r JOIN payment p ON p.rvt_id = r.rvt_id WHERE r.rvt_date = #{rvtDate, jdbcType=DATE} AND r.zone_id = #{zoneId} AND (p.pay_state = 'P' OR p.pay_state = 'Q') GROUP BY r.usage_start_time, r.usage_end_time

SELECT r.rvt_date AS "rvtDate", r.usage_count AS "usageCount", r.usage_end_time AS "usageEndTime", r.usage_start_time AS "usageStartTime", m.mem_name AS "memName", z.zone_name AS "zoneName", p.pay_price AS "payPrice", p.pay_state AS "payState" FROM reservation r JOIN zone z ON z.zone_id = r.zone_id JOIN facility f ON f.fct_id = z.fct_id JOIN payment p on p.rvt_id = r.rvt_id JOIN member m on m.mem_id = r.cons_id WHERE f.fct_id = #{fctId} ORDER BY r.rvt_date DESC

SELECT cons_id FROM reservation
WHERE TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(rvt_date, 'yyyy-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(usage_start_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI:SS') <= #{criteriaTime} + INTERVAL '1' HOUR * #{leftReservationTimeInHour}
SELECT f.prov_id FROM reservation r INNER JOIN zone z ON z.zone_id = r.zone_id INNER JOIN facility f ON f.fct_id = z.fct_id WHERE r.rvt_id = #{rvtId}
